content:
Hello ğŸ‘‹ # Iâ€™m Liu Xuecheng, an audio algorithm engineer with a focus on speech understanding, acoustic perception, and array signal processing.
Currently, I work as a senior audio algorithm engineer at a tech company, where I lead the design and development of multimodal speech interaction architectures and train speech large language models (SpeechLLMs).
In my free time, I build AI Agent projects and share my technical thoughts on this blog.
About This Site # This site is built with Hugo + Blowfish and deployed on both GitHub Pages and Cloudflare Pages.
